org.youscope.plugin.livemodifiablejob

Interface LiveModifiableJob

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, EditableJobContainer, Job, JobContainer, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface LiveModifiableJob
extends Job, EditableJobContainer
    Interface of a measurement job which collects statistical data about the evaluation and appends it to a file.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JobConfiguration[] getChildJobConfigurations()
      Returns the job configurations of the currently active child jobs.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns true if child jobs are executed during this jobs execution.
      void setChildJobConfigurations(JobConfiguration[] newConfigurations)
      Sets the configurations of the child jobs.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Set to true if the child jobs should be executed during the next execution of this job, and to false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Set to true if the child jobs should be executed during the next execution of this job, and to false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        enabled - TRUE to execute child jobs.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns true if child jobs are executed during this jobs execution.
        Returns:

      • getChildJobConfigurations

        JobConfiguration[] getChildJobConfigurations()
                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                             java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Returns the job configurations of the currently active child jobs.
        Returns:
        array of child jobs.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException

      • setChildJobConfigurations

        void setChildJobConfigurations(JobConfiguration[] newConfigurations)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                               java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
        Sets the configurations of the child jobs. Any previously existing child jobs will be removed and replaced by the jobs defined in the configuration.
        Parameters:
        newConfigurations - array of new child jobs
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        java.lang.CloneNotSupportedException
